name: YouGizmos
tag_list: creativity, portal, projects, how-tos, videos, community, product-development, marketization
overview:
Everything you need to bring your creation to life

Connecting creators, advisors, and the marketplace.

You have an idea. Whether you want to simply self-publish your plans, bring a product all the way to Wal-Martâ€™s shelves, or anything in-between, we can help.

You can find resources to:

  • Fund your idea: investors, loans, etc
  • Protect your idea: patents, copyrights and trademarks
  • Make your idea beautiful: industrial design
  • Make your idea manufacturable: product design
  • Test your idea: FEA, prototypes, market research
  • Build your idea: manufacturing
  • Expose your idea to the masses: sales and marketing … to name just a few.

Product development and commercialization.
